about_the_game:
Hello Hackers from arround the world!

Let us introduce you to Super Hack Attack, a puzzle-combat multiplayer game sited in a not-so-distant future, in which ferocious coding battles takes place to become the most prolific hacker on earth. Combat against your friends in frenzy hacking matches (both local and online) and always remember: dexterity and strategy are key to overcome your rivals.

The goal in SHA is to ban your opponent by destroying their Network using a combination of Malware, Special Programs, Defensive and Offensive Maneuvers, and Super Software to attack them.

Each playable character has its own background story, motivations and Super Software. Battles occurs in a variety of locations, each stage has different features, as number of PCs, connections and hazards. Take every aspect of the match to become victorious.

name: Super Hack Attack!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 11
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 380 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

short_description: Super Hack Attack is a puzzle combat game, based on dexterity and strategy. The goal is to ban your opponent by destroying their Network using a combination of Malware, Special Programs, Defensive/Offensive Maneuvers, and Super Software to attack them.
